body:
Recently, my brother started a new world on my account. It was some weird preset called Tunneler's Dream. Right after it was created, weird things started to happen. The blocks would have a layer of black over them in a certain region, or the lava texture. Sometimes, when chunks are loading on Avicus, it loads with yellow or orange on them. As soon as they load, the colors go away.

Before my brother created this world, none of this was happening. It's kind of annoying me and him, because there will be random colors appearing and disappearing after a second. Could anyone help me fix this problem?
body_tagged:

title: Corrupted Chunks?

replies.body:
I've never had this problem before.

I did have something similar though...
I was using 64 bit java settings when I had only 32 bit java. I now have 64 bit, so I don't know what the problem is.

Also, I'm getting a new computer soon, but the one I use now will be used more by my brother and he will make a huge fuss about it.
